description:
Now a member of Team Hokage, Koganei faces down Shiju, the chimera. But even after winning, Domon and Fuko are still missing. Koganei will need to fight again, and this time the opponent is someone he knows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Impact! A Decisive Flash of Lightning!!
衝撃!! 電光石火の決着!!
